# Post Steam store link in chat for current category
Uses IGDB API to get the steam link for the current game category

IGDB API uses Twitch Authentication, so you'll need to create a twitch App via the developer portal to get a client id and client secret.

- For further details: https://api-docs.igdb.com/#getting-started
- Twitch dev console: https://dev.twitch.tv/

Source code available in src/code.cs

## Setup instructions

1. Set up a twitch app via the twitch dev portal
2. Use the import string below to get the action and command trigger
3. Enter your Twitch Id and Twitch Client Secret in the appropriate arguments
4. type !steam in chat

## Import string
